entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in XBRL rule processor (xule) successful, version Check version using Tools->Xule->Version on the GUI or --xule-version on the command line. - xule
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC
[info] Activation of plug-in Validate EFM successful, version 1.21.1. - validate/EFM
[info] Activation of plug-in Inline XBRL Document Set successful, version 1.1. - inlineXbrlDocumentSet

[DQR.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of [210000] Statement of financial position, current/non-current but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ProfitLossFromPreviousYears, ProfitLossFromCurrentPeriod, ifrs-full:CapitalReserve, OtherCapitalReserve All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 -

[DQR.IFRS.0129.9625] It is expected that ProfitLossAttributableToOwnersOfParent with a value of 170,369,000 reported in the network role http://www.mlpgroup.com/role/ias_1_role-310000 should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, ProfitLoss with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:EquityAttributableToOwnersOfParentMember and a reported value of 480,470,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role http://www.mlpgroup.com/role/ias_1_role-610000. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:ProfitLossAttributableToOwnersOfParent fact are:
Period : 2021-01-01 to 2021-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : PLN Decimals of ProfitLossAttributableToOwnersOfParent : -3 Decimals of ProfitLoss : -3 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/2594005Q9DIECHVXBO95/2021-12-31/ESEF/PL/0/mlg_2021-12-31_pl.zip/mlg_2021-12-31_pl/reports/mlg_2021-12-31_pl.xhtml 39366
